model_answer: The answer is C: Event 10: He introduces light brown as the color for items re-written on a second review, with a whiteboard showing a consolidated color list. This event allowed the presenter to have a visual reference of the colors he has used, which helped him in wrapping up the presentation by stating that he has covered all the colors he uses in Notability.
The correct answer(s) are B and C. Events 7 and 9 provided specific color coding schemes that were used on the whiteboard, leading to the compilation of the list of colors seen in event 10.
